scripts.start: npx nodemon -w src -w lib --exec "npm run build >/dev/null && npx serve dist"
scripts.prepare: mkdir -p prepare && rsync -a src/ prepare/src && rsync -a lib/ prepare/lib
scripts.loaders: npm run clear && npm run prepare && python3 loaders.py
scripts.build: npm run loaders && esbuild ./prepare/**/*.js --metafile=meta.json --bundle --outdir=dist && npm run after-build
